sentences.en: A few cases of influenza cropped out every now and then.
sentences.cn: 不时出现一些流行性感冒的病例.

sentences.en: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.en: Every year new strains of influenza develop.
sentences.cn: 每年都有新的流感病毒出现。

sentences.en: He is struck down with influenza.
sentences.cn: 他因患流行感冒而卧床.

sentences.en: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.cn: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

sentences.en: She takes a vaccine against influenza every fall.
sentences.cn: 她每年秋季接种流感疫苗.

sentences.en: Steps must be taken to prevent the spread of influenza.
sentences.cn: 必须采取步骤防止流行性感冒传染开来.

sentences.en: The boy has come down with influenza.
The doctor diagnosed the illness as influenza.
sentences.cn: 医生诊断此病为流行感冒.

sentences.en: The last attack of influenza has left me rather groggy.
sentences.cn: 上次患流行性感冒后使我至今软弱无力.

sentences.en: The last attack of influenza left me rather grogg.
sentences.cn: 上次患流感使得我软弱无力.

sentences.en: The whole village was attacked with influenza.
sentences.cn: 整个村子的人都得了流行性感冒.

sentences.en: They took steps to prevent the spread of influenza.
sentences.cn: 他们采取措施阻止流感的传播.

sentences.en: This kind of weather often brings on influenza.
sentences.cn: 这种天气常常会引起流行性感冒.
